title: Cap Tracking API Routes
description:
Create REST API Routes for Cap Tracking and Compliance Monitoring

Develop a comprehensive set of RESTful API endpoints to manage cap tracking and compliance monitoring functionality.

Requirements:
- Define resource endpoints for cap tracking (e.g., GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/caps)
- Create endpoints for compliance monitoring data (e.g., GET /api/compliance/status, GET /api/compliance/reports)
- Implement query parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination
- Add endpoints to retrieve cap utilization metrics and historical trends
- Create endpoints for compliance alert configuration and notifications
- Include validation middleware for request payloads
- Implement proper HTTP status codes and error responses
- Add rate limiting to prevent API abuse
- Document all endpoints with request/response schemas
- Include authentication and authorization checks
- Add audit logging for compliance-related operations
- Write integration tests for all endpoints

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handling concurrent cap updates
- Managing caps that span multiple time periods
- Dealing with partial compliance data
- Handling timezone differences in compliance reporting
